title: I am going to commit suicide. You have to write something to stop me from doing so. What will you write? - Quora

response.answer_text: What if “Salil Jamdar” had the same thought, when everything was against him? He wouldn't be an inspiration for so many people now. So don't give up on you.

Whoever u are stop messing around with ppl. They will remember u for at the most a month and then we will all be partying like it never happened. Only category A losers give up on life. Go to hell, if u had not created one, you would not have been talking about dying. Btw after u die your wife/husband or gf/bf will be in bed with ur best friend. Somebody has to wipe their tears right!
